story.description:
Implement HAIAMM Environment Hardening (EH) practice at Level 1 maturity.

## Practice Overview

**Function:** Operations
**Purpose:** Secure AI runtime environments

## Level 1 Objectives

Establish basic security controls for AI runtime environments.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Basic hardening applied
  - API authentication required
  - HTTPS/TLS for all communications
  - Secrets not hardcoded
  - Default credentials changed

- [ ] Input validation implemented
  - Length limits enforced
  - Rate limiting enabled
  - Basic content filtering active
  - Encoding handled properly

- [ ] Output controls implemented
  - Sensitive pattern filtering
  - Response size limits
  - Error message sanitization
  - System prompt protection

- [ ] Access controls configured
  - Authentication required
  - Authorization enforced
  - Audit logging enabled
  - Session management implemented

## Definition of Done

- [ ] All acceptance criteria met
- [ ] Hardening verified via testing
- [ ] Configuration documented
- [ ] Monitoring confirms controls active

## OWASP Risks Addressed

- LLM01: Prompt Injection
- LLM07: System Prompt Leakage
- LLM08: Vector and Embedding Weaknesses
- LLM10: Unbounded Consumption
- ASI03: Identity & Privilege Abuse
- ASI05: Unexpected Code Execution

## Resources

- [EH Practice Guide](https://github.com/R3v3rzk1mur4/HAIAMM/docs/practices/EH-Software-OnePager.md)
- [Deployment Readiness Checklist](https://github.com/R3v3rzk1mur4/HAIAMM/docs/templates/checklists/deployment-readiness-checklist.md)

Use `/verifhai-practice EH` for hardening guidance.
